Description:
Job Title: Sr. Manager (Sales Aftermarket) Location: Chennai (Sales Office)Responsibilities and Functions:     Fully responsible for all aspects of the assigned Territory for After Market.              
Responsible for Distribution and Dealer Management.
New business development with assigned territory.
Knowledge of application based technical specifications and forecasting the business opportunities for the assigned territory.
Cross cultural relationship management and should be familiar with demography.
Strategic planning and building up short- and long-term business plans.Job Skills & Competencies:Interpersonal Skills                                                                                                 
Analytical Skills       
Negotiation Skills
Process and Product Knowledge
Data Based and Technical ApproachEducation:BE/Btech/Post GraduationExperience:15+ YearsMandate skills:* Managing sales aftermarket for rubber components for Automotive segment only.* Having Distributor management experience.Job Details
